pr_title: CB-8960 Adding multiple gateway nodes and mini node for DL HA

timeline.bodyText: Could we give it a more meaningful name than "alpha"?
timeline.author: hreeve-cloudera

replies.bodyText: changed to auxiliary and master to main.
replies.author: frozenwizard

timeline.message:
CB-8960 Adding multiple gateway nodes and mini node for DL HA

This adds 2 gateway nodes and a small alpha node.  The alpha node currently
contains Atlas due to OPSAPS-57449 and will be put on the gateway node later.
This also renames master to main.
